about_text:
Gilank is a duo of Bradford-based experimental electro-acoustic musicians, Alice Gilmour and shi Blank.

They work with an array of loopers, pedals, synths, MIDI controllers, and acoustic instruments.

One person starts, often with a shared thought in mind, the other adds a layer, and so on.

Each responds to the other's input in real-time, their interactions shaping the evolving composition.
body: You might want to go home.

index.html.news_text:
6.2.2025
Thankful to be included in Augustin Bousfield's Bradford City of Culture 2025 Playlist for BBC Radio 6 Music. Have a listen (we're 24:25 in).
24.1.2025
We spent the day at Nave Studios with Ozzy Moysey and the Leeds Improv Orchestra - new album sometime out this year, perhaps?!
12.12.2024
Perfomance at the celebration of Theatre in the Mill's re-opening.
27.7.2024
Our set at Edible Archives' Drinking St George's Hall event for BD:Festival 2024.
